l Short tifle and commencement.{1) This Ordinance shall be
called the Criminal Law (Amendment) Ordinance, 2023.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
2. Amendment in section 4620, Act No. XLY of 1860.-(1) In the
Pakistan Penal Code, 1860 (XLV of 1860), for section 4620, the following shall
' be substituted, namely:-
"4620. Cognizance.-(1) The offences punishable under this
Chapter shall be cogntzable however the police shall not take
cognizance of an offence under this Chapter except where
information of an offence under this Chapter is provided to the
police in writing by a duly authorized officer (not below Grade 17)
of the Government or by a person duly authortzed by a Chief
Executive Officer of a power distribution company as the case may
be.".
